title.text: Taiyou no Katamuita Kono Sekai de - Broken Chronograph
In This World With Tilted Sun - Broken Chronograph
太陽の傾いたこの世界で -broken chronograph-

detailEpisodeInfo.summery:
Willem Kmetsch lives life as an outcast, like a dead man walking, until he happens to land a job as the caretaker of some rather "special" weapons.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.text: Sora no Ue no Mori no Naka no - Late Autumn Night's Dream
Inside a Forest in the Sky - Late Autumn Night's Dream
空の上の森の中の -late autumn night's dream-

detailEpisodeInfo.summery:
Chtholly's bombshell leaves Willem shaken, as he struggles to come to terms with the nature of the "special weapons."

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.text: Kono Tatakai ga Owattara - Starry Road to Tomorrow
When This Battle Have Ended - Starry Road to Tomorrow
この戦いが終わったら -starry road to tomorrow-

detailEpisodeInfo.summery:
Having learned about Chtholly's impending fate, Willem tries to come up with an alternate plan, much to her chagrin.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.text: Kaeranu Mono to, Machitsuzuketa Monotachi - Dice in Pot
Person Who Have Not Come Back and Persons Who Have Waited - Dice in Pot
帰らぬ者と、待ち続けた者たち -dice in pot-

detailEpisodeInfo.summery:
Having sent his charges into battle, Willem finds the distraction he so badly needs in the form of a visit to cultural hotpot Corna di Luce.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.text: Dare mo Kare mo ga, Seigi no Na no Moto ni - From Dawn Till Dusk
Everyone, in the Name of Justice - From Dawn Till Dusk
誰も彼もが、正義の名のもとに -from dawn till dusk-

detailEpisodeInfo.summery:
Phyracorlybia details her request to Limeskin, who refuses and asks Willem for a favor of his own.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.text: Kienai Kako, Kieteiku Mirai - No News Was Good News
Unerasable Past, Disappearing Future - No News Was Good News
消えない過去、消えていく未来 -no news was good news-

detailEpisodeInfo.summery:
Willem learns a lot from Souwong and makes a stand. Meanwhile, Chtholly continues to hear the voices in her head...

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.text: Tadaima Kaerimashita - Home, Sweet Home
I'm Home - Home, Sweet Home
ただいま帰りました -home, sweet home-

detailEpisodeInfo.summery:
The warehouse has to deal with the ramifications of Chtholly's condition. At the same time, things begin to unravel on the surface.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.text: Izure Sono Hi wa Ochiru Toshitemo - Slight Light, Slight Hope
Even If Eventually That Sun Will Fall - Slight Light, Slight Hope
いずれその陽は落ちるとしても -slight light, slight hope-

detailEpisodeInfo.summery:
As the situation on the surface continues to simmer, Chtholly struggles to come to terms with her new life.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.text: Tatoe Mirai ga Mienakute mo - Moonlit Sorcery
No Matter If Future Is Nowhere to Be Seen - Moonlit Sorcery
たとえ未来が見えなくても -moonlit sorcery-

detailEpisodeInfo.summery:
Things continue to get worse for Chtholly, who bravely decides to live in the moment. Meanwhile, the rescue operation to the surface finally begins.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.text: Ima Kono Toki no Kagayaki wo - My Happiness
Brightness at This Moment - My Happiness
いまこの時の輝きを -my happiness-

detailEpisodeInfo.summery:
Chtholly helps out around the base as his secretary and gains the adulation of everyone there. Willem, on the other hand, starts having doubts about some unanswered questions after meeting Nopht and Rhantolk.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.text: Douka, Wasurenaide - Evidence of Existance
Please, Do Not Forget - Evidence of Existance
どうか、忘れないで -evidence of existance-

detailEpisodeInfo.summery:
The situation on the surface heats up as a massive cave is found beneath Gomag City, and lying there is something very unexpected.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.text: Sekai de Ichiban Shiawase na Onnanoko - Chtholly
The Happiest Girl in the World - Chtholly
世界で一番幸せな女の子 -CHTHOLLY-

detailEpisodeInfo.summery:
A desperate battle unfolds upon the Saxifraga as it tries to escape the attack of timere. Chtholly, clinging to the last pieces of emotions she still possesses, decides to fight.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

names.name: WorldEnd: What Do You Do at the End of the World? Are You Busy? Will You Save Us?
WorldEnd: What do you do at the end of the world? Are you busy? Will you save us?
終末なにしてますか？忙しいですか？救ってもらっていいですか？
Shuumatsu Nani Shitemasu ka? Isogashii desu ka? Sukutte Moratte Ii desu ka?

overviews.content:
The fleeting and sad story about little girls known as fairy weapons and an associate hero that survived. This is a world after it was attacked by unidentified monsters known as beasts and many of the species in the world, including humans, had been destroyed. The species that had managed to survived left the ground and were living on a floating island called Regal Ele. Willem Kumesh, wakes up above the clouds 500 years later and couldn’t protect the ones who he wanted to protect. Actually, he was living in despair because he was the only survivor.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
